OpenSim::rdCMC_Orientation

rdCMC_Orientation Class Reference

#include <rdCMC_Orientation.h>

Inheritance diagram for rdCMC_Orientation:

Detailed Description

A class for tracking the orientation of a body.

This class, although roughed out, is not yet fully implemented.

Author:
Frank C. Anderson
Version:
1.0
